data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Leon.
In the minute 3, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna have a dangerous throw-in.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Santos Laguna.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Julio Furch for Santos Laguna drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Santos Laguna's Bryan Garnica breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to Leon's area.
In the minute 21, Leon drive forward but Emanuel Gigliotti is judged offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Important block from the Santos Laguna defence as Jean Meneses fires in a strike for Leon.
Leon's Emanuel Gigliotti gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Leon.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 31, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Julio Furch gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos Laguna.
Leon needs to be cautious. Santos Laguna have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In Leon Santos Laguna attack through Bryan Garnica. The finish is off target, however.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
William Tesillo is booked for the home team.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 38, Jose van Rankin (Santos Laguna) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 40, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Leon's half.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 41, Santos Laguna take a 0-1 lead thanks to Julio Furch.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Leon in the half of Santos Laguna.
Walter Sandoval (Santos Laguna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Leon.
Santos Laguna's Hugo Rodriguez has been booked in Leon.
Stiven Barreiro for Leon has been booked by Oscar Mejia Garcia and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Leon.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 47, Jean Meneses (Leon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos Laguna pushes forward through Julio Furch, whose finish on goal is saved.
At Estadio Leon, David Andrade has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Luis Montes gets an equalizer for Leon. The score is now 1-1.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 55, Leon are coming forward and Angel Mena gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon is whistled offside.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Leon.
In Leon, Angel Mena of Leon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 58, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fidel Daniel Ambriz Gonzalez.
Bryan Garnica is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 60, Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a first substitution, with Diego Valdes replacing Bryan Garnica.
Santos Laguna's Bryan Garnica looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 61, Fidel Daniel Ambriz Gonzalez has recovered and rejoins the match in Leon.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
The home team have replaced Emanuel Gigliotti with Joel Campbell. This is the first substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 72, David Ramirez puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Great play from Angel Mena to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Leon.
In the minute 79, Carlos Orrantia is replacing Walter Sandoval for Santos Laguna at Estadio Leon.
Leon have a goal kick.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Leon with Jose Rodriguez replacing David Ramirez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ronaldo Prieto is replacing David Andrade for the away team.
Santos Laguna drives forward and Julio Furch gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 86, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 88, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Leon's half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 89, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Julio Furch's finish is wide of the goal.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Leon a goal kick.
At Estadio Leon the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
In Leon Santos Laguna drive forward through Diego Valdes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Diego Valdes (Santos Laguna) has received a yellow card from Oscar Mejia Garcia.
